data.title: Welcome To Turlock
data.text:
Stanislaus County Cooling Zones / Clean Air Zones Summer 2024

Cooling and Clean Air Zones are available for the Summer of 2024. The Roger K. Fall Transit Center at 1418 N. Golden State Blvd is a designated cooling and clean air zone. The Transit Center is open Monday - Friday from 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM and Saturday from 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM. The Transit Center will be open on Thursday, July 4th, 2024 from 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM. The Turlock Public Library at 550 Minaret Avenue is also a designated cooling and clean air zone. The Turlock Public Library is open Monday - Tuesday from 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Wednesday from 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM, Thursday from 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM, and Saturday from 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Click Here for All Stanislaus County Cooling Zones >>

Exciting News: City of Turlock is Going Mobile with a new app powered by GOGov!

The app is a great source of information for news, events, service interruptions and updates, and important links to the website. Staff can streamline important community communications and information to citizens in more efficient ways. Additionally, it allows citizens to make service requests via a mobile app. The app is available for download in the Apple App and Google Play online stores. Click Here for More Information >>
